featured.text: Cartier-Bresson traveled to Africa in 1931 to hunt antelope and boar.

definition.zh_def: 一種生活在草原和開放地區的有蹄類動物，通常具有長腿和優雅的身體，屬於羚羊科。
definition.en_def: A swift, hoofed mammal found in open grasslands and savannas, typically characterized by long legs and a slender body, belonging to the family Bovidae.
definition.example: The antelope gracefully leaped across the plains.
